12925.<pc>の 持っている\n『超天遊戯－弐の書－』が 光り始めた！:
The copy of 'Choten Yugi: Book Two' in your
possession began to glow!

12926.白紙だったページに 文字が浮かびあがってくる。\n<pc>は その文字を読んだ。:
The blank pages are now filled with words.
<pc> began reading them.

12927.見つけられてしもうたか。くやしいのう……。\nまあ よいわ。見つけた ほうびに\:
Looks like you found it. What a shame... I'll
just have to give you a tough lesson to make
up for it.

12928.ためるを使って テンションを上げた状態で\n<%sEV_QUE_NAME0> <:
Use Psyche Up to get the <%sEV_QUE_NAME0> <%nEV_QUE_T_NUM0> to roost with their tension! They are
outside this tower on Windmill Way.

12929.前にも書いたが とどめをさしたら\nその戦いから 逃げたり 負けたりせんように。:
As I have written before, once you deal the
finishing blow, do not run away or lose the
fight. You have to win, got it?

12930.<start_lip_sync n01108 _normal m00001>「こ:

12932.<start_lip_sync n01108 _normal m00001>「こ:

12940.<start_lip_sync n01109 _normal m00001>「あ:
